about_the_game:
HD DLC configuration: 2K, 10bit, 60fps HD video expansion, win10 system needs to install HEVC expansion, 100GB memory, (The game itself is 2K, 8bit, 30fps)

Please click the DLC button in the lower right corner of the game’s main interface to perform the video test first.After downloading the HD DLC, the content of the game will be automatically overwritten. Please ensure that the test is successful before downloading, so as not to affect normal game play.

Higher quality video can bring you a better game experience. You can download DLC according to your own situation. We hope HD DLC will bring you a better experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the game's video content and lines may contain: "partial nudity", "sexual references", "alcohol abuse", etc. and may not be suitable for all ages.

detailed_description:
HD DLC configuration: 2K, 10bit, 60fps HD video expansion, win10 system needs to install HEVC expansion, 100GB memory, (The game itself is 2K, 8bit, 30fps)

Please click the DLC button in the lower right corner of the game’s main interface to perform the video test first.After downloading the HD DLC, the content of the game will be automatically overwritten. Please ensure that the test is successful before downloading, so as not to affect normal game play.

Higher quality video can bring you a better game experience. You can download DLC according to your own situation. We hope HD DLC will bring you a better experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11
  • Processor: Inter Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡或集成显卡
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 需要支持10bit播放
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS Sonoma 14或以上
  • Processor: Apple M 系列显卡
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 需要支持10bit播放

name: Superscout HD DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 独立显卡或集成显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 需要支持10bit播放
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Inter Core i5或AMD equivalent 或以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 需要支持10bit播放

short_description: HD DLC configuration: 2K, 10bit, 60fps HD video expansion, win10 system needs to install HEVC expansion, 100GB memory, The game itself is 2K, 8bit, 30fps.

English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean
